body:
Summer is approaching, and soon most of us will be out of school. 
So, where are you planning on going on vacation this summer?
I'll be visiting New York City with my best friend, Missouri with another one of my close friends, and going on a two-week road trip in our RV around various places in America, what about you guys? ^-^
body_tagged:
Summer is approaching, and soon most of us will be out of school. 
So, where are you planning on going on vacation this summer?
I'll be visiting New York City with my best friend, Missouri with another one of my close friends, and going on a two-week road trip in our RV around various places in America, what about you guys? ^-^
title: Where are you vacationing this summer?
